abstract: Analysts and pundits have already speculated about how much hot Web phenoms such as Facebook would be worth if and when they go public. Now, Henry Blodget — he of the $400 Amazon.com stock prediction — has trained his eye on one of the browsers used to view those sites.
lead_paragraph: Analysts and pundits have already speculated about how much hot Web phenoms such as Facebook would be worth if and when they go public. Now, Henry Blodget — he of the $400 Amazon.com stock prediction — has trained his eye on one of the browsers used to view those sites.

headline.main: How Much for a Firefox I.P.O.?
